document_data.caption: A map showing the Teshpost Trail in the Dragonspine Mountains.
document_data.name: Teshpost Trail
document_data.mainbody: The '''Teshpost Trail''' was a small roadway in the [[Moonsea]] region that connected [[Teshwave]] with the [[Citadel of the Raven]].
document_data.Description: The Teshpost Trail exited Teshwave on the city's north side, entering the [[Dragonspine Mountains]] near [[Mount Tesh]] where it joined the [[Zhentilar Trail]] just south of the Citadel of the Raven.
